name: Imperium Naturae
description:
3D Modeling and Animation: Antoine DEJEAN, Erwan

GAUDICHON, Gensana MANCEAU, Jade BRUNEAU, Antonin

PICHON, Anouck ELISABETH and Gwen LE BEAU;

Programming/Integration : Titouan CADORET, Antoine

DEJEAN;

Game Design: Justine CREPEL and Gwen LE BEAU.

Sound Design : Antonin PICHON and Anouck ELISABETH

After more than 200 years of exile, a group of humans returns to the planet. Earth and wants to recolonize it. However, the robots plants that live there on this planet since then, have been identifying humans as a threat and adopting a hostile attitude towards them. The player embodies a reconnaissance vessel that flies over the Earth.
